name.baseName: Fine coal, wet coke quenching, screening, transfer, etc. ; Semi-coke (lang char) ; Raw material coal (low rank coal) ; Semi-coke (lang char) ; All sizes; NESPS2
精煤、湿熄焦、筛分、转运等 ; 半焦（兰炭） ; 原料煤（低阶煤） ; 半焦（兰炭） ; 所有规模 ; 全国第二次污染普查数据

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: the treatment technology for the pollution of Exhaust gasdidn't offered

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: the treatment technology for the pollution of Exhaust gasdidn't offered
technology.technologicalApplicability: 所描述的工业过程包括从低阶煤生产出各种规格的半焦（兰炭）的步骤，涉及精煤处理、湿熄焦、筛分和转运等。生产的半焦通常用作工业燃料，或用于铁合金、碳制品、电极以及其他化学处理过程。这一数据集并未关注颗粒物（PM2.5 - PM10）或二氧化硫的污染控制措施，其显示的是直接排放，末端治理技术的效率为零。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 第二次全国污染源普查产排污核算系数手册（试用版）,二级代码25,四级代码2521文件，在完整版文件中第2881页

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: This dataset is derived from the Pollution Source Census Report and contains information on pollution emissions and related products. However, it does not include data on energy or chemical consumption, nor does it provide information on waste or co-product generation. When utilizing this dataset, please supplement the missing data based on actual conditions before use
该数据集来源于污染源普查报告，包含污染物排放及相关产品信息，但不包含能源或化学品消耗数据，也不提供废弃物或共生产物产生信息。在使用该数据集时，请根据实际情况补充缺失数据后再使用。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

common:referenceToPersonOrEntityGenerati.common:shortDescription: The data was created by the Office of the Second National Pollution Source Census of the Ministry of Ecology and Environment, and the data was organized by the TianGong Plan team for ILCD format
生态环境部第二次全国污染源普查工作办公室创建数据，天工计划团队常慧敏整理数据为ILCD格式

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution sulfur dioxideisDirect discharge，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management0，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is /
污染物指标二氧化硫的末端治理技术是直排，其效率为0，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为-。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为二氧化硫，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为二氧化硫

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution particles (PM2.5 - PM10)isDirect discharge，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management0，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is /
污染物指标颗粒物的末端治理技术是直排，其效率为0，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为-。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为颗粒物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为颗粒物
源文件中描述为为半焦（兰炭），此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为工业废气量
the treatment technology for the pollution of Exhaust gasdidn't offered
污染物指标工业废气量的末端治理技术是-，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为-。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为工业废气量，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为工业废气量
